DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 #yCombo whenever you deal the same type of damage as the last damage you dealt. Lose all #yCombo when you deal a different type of damage.
Resistant creatures take #b50% less damage from Attacks.
Whenever you deal a different type of damage from the last damage you dealt, you #ySpellweave.
Singed creatures take damage at the end of their turn. When they're healed, Singe is removed.
Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may exhaust any of them.
